BugInstance.message: Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.single.datanode.SingleTableDataNodeLoader.loadSchemaTableNames(String, DatabaseType, DataSource, String) converts checked exception to unchecked

org.apache.shardingsphere.single.decider.SingleSQLFederationDecider.addTableDataNodes(SQLFederationDeciderContext, SingleRule, Collection): 2nd parameter 'rule' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.identifier.type.MutableDataNodeRule instead
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.single.exception.DropNotEmptySchemaException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.single.exception.SingleTableNotFoundException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.single.exception.SingleTablesLoadingException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.single.exception.UnsupportedDropCascadeTableException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value

org.apache.shardingsphere.single.route.engine.SingleStandardRouteEngine.fillRouteContext(SingleRule, RouteContext, Collection): 1st parameter 'singleRule' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.identifier.type.MutableDataNodeRule instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.single.route.validator.SingleMetaDataValidatorFactory.newInstance(SQLStatement) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
